Translations.Text: Singaya phumka deya habe, takhana'i tara kabara theke tadera palanakartara dike chute calabe.
Tara balabe, haya amadera durbhoga! Ke amaderake nidrasthala theke ukhita karala? Rahamana allaha to era'i oyada diyechilena ebam rasulagana satya balechilena.
Eta to habe kebala eka mahanada. Se muhurte'i tadera saba'ike amara samane upasthita kara habe.
Ajakera dine kara'o prati juluma kara habe na ebam tomara ya karabe kebala tara'i pratidana pabe.
Tara ebam tadera strira upabista thakabe chayamaya paribese asane helana diye.
Sekhane tadera jan'ye thakabe phala-mula ebam ya ca'ibe.
Karunamaya palanakartara paksa theke taderake bala habe salama.
He aparadhira! Aja tomara alada haye ya'o.
He bani-adama! Ami ki tomaderake bale rakhini ye, sayatanera ebadata karo na, se tomadera prakasya satru
ebam amara ebadata kara. Eta'i sarala patha.
Sayatana tomadera aneka dalake pathabhrasta kareche. Tabu'o ki tomara bujhani
e'i se jahannama, yara oyada tomaderake deya hato.
Tomadera kupharera karane aja ete prabesa kara.
Aja ami tadera mukhe mohara emte deba tadera hata amara sathe katha balabe ebam tadera pa tadera krtakarmera saksya debe.
Ami iccha karale tadera drsti sakti bilupta kare dite paratama, takhana tara pathera dike daurate ca'ile kemana kare dekhate peta
ami iccha karale taderake sba sba sthane akara bikrta karate paratama, phale tara age'o calate parata na ebam pechane'o phire yete parata na.
